Title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in tinymce.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 4.9.11, all versions starting from 5.0.0 before 5.4.1
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 4.9.11 before 5.0.0, all versions starting from 5.4.1
